name: SurvivalSiege
description:
A very early  prototype of a game im working on. Comments appreciated.

Good luck on reaching wave 10 in the fastest possible time!

Move: WASD

Switch Mainskills: 1,2,3

Use Mainskill: Left/Right Mousebutton

Skilltree/Equipment: ESC

PS: Second skill is a variation of first, to trigger the DamageOverTime effect, you need to skill it first in the second tree!

Summon the entire Wave instantly (Stacks per click): Spacebar
(you better not use this for now...)

Mainskills:

1. Icicle power

2. Icicle Curse (Damage over time)

3. Virus Wave
